text: @realDonaldTrump "We" may be smarter, but you're dumber than a box of rocks. The information on a package of Band Aids has more medical knowledge than you. From the FDA's own authorization letter: "Chloroquine phosphate and hydroxychloroquine sulfate are not FDA-approved for treatment of COVID-19
